summary.p: Converts a given value to a 16-bit signed integer.

examples.p: The following shows TO_INT16 results for some input data:
examples.sampleCode: SELECT 'The TO_INT16 result of value ''1'' is: ' AS Input, TO_INT16('1') AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_INT16 result of value ''-1'' is: ' AS Input, TO_INT16('-1') AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_INT16 result of value 16000.999 is: ' AS Input, TO_INT16(16000.999) AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_INT16 result of value 16001.999 is: ' AS Input, TO_INT16(16001.999) AS Value
